Title: 1. People

According to a new social media trend with the hashtag #CoffeeLove, it's not just about the caffeine boost - it's about the experience! From sipping at a local coffee shop to cozying up with a mug at home, people can't seem to get enough of their java fix. So go ahead and join in on the #CoffeeLove hype - your taste buds will thank you!
